document.full_text: together again, mahesh bhupathi, 36, and leander paes, 37, have earned nearly $500,000 and arrive at roland garros as the third-seeded doubles team, reflecting their current atp ranking. they open play here at roland garros on thursday.
document.title: divorce, tennis-style, ends in a second marriage
lines_and_colors: together again, mahesh bhupathi, 36, and leander paes, 37, have earned nearly $500,000 and arrive at roland garros as the third-seeded doubles team, reflecting their current atp ranking. they open play here at roland garros on thursday.
